title: Billion Dollar Date
description: "Hello, Enzo."With just two simple words, Chari Atwood storms back into my life.Beautiful. Irresistible. The woman standing before me is not the girl I knew growing up.And I'm not the same hopeful kid everyone thought was going nowhere fast.Nowadays, I'm a hero. A celebrity. A man who isn't content with the billions in his bank account.Call me ambitious if you want. I have my sights set on the rest of the world, and don't have time for a relationshipâ€”even with the one woman who still has the power to bring me to my knees.I will not break.I will not succumb.Except that I'm used to getting exactly what I want, and after one chance encounter, it's clear that what I want is Chari Atwood . . .Even if she is my best friend's little sister.Billion Dollar Date is a second chance standalone romance with its own HEA. For readers who enjoy big Italian families and sexy brothers who love to outdo each other, it can also be read as a part of the Boys of Bridgewater series.
author: Cissy Mecca
